document.full_text: three of six reactors at a japanese nuclear plant damaged in a march 11 earthquake and tsunami suffered metldowns within days, the plant's operator said tuesday, raising questions about why the extent of the disaster was not disclosed sooner.
document.title: u.n. safety agency begins probe into fukushima meltdowns
lines_and_colors: three of six reactors at a japanese nuclear plant damaged in a march 11 earthquake and tsunami suffered metldowns within days, the plant's operator said tuesday, raising questions about why the extent of the disaster was not disclosed sooner.
